title: FS: 4 graded T204's (Kleinow, Knight, Brown, Rucker)
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: FS: 4 graded T204's (Kleinow, Knight, Brown, Rucker)
posts.post_content:
I have [S]4[/S] (now 2) graded T204's for sale.  PM me if you want to purchase one or more.  I'd prefer a check, but PP F&F is acceptable, too.  

T204 Brown SGC 40 - $850
T204 Rucker PSA 5 - $495.  There are only 3 PSA cards graded higher and all are in registry collections.  There are only 3 PSA 5's and this is one.
T204 Knight SGC 40 - [S]$200[/S] SOLD.  Low pop card in both PSA and SGC reports.
T204 Kleinow SGC 30 - [S]$160[/S] SOLD (b.o.).  Very low pop card in both PSA and SGC reports.
